parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1 </name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.70

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Controls Table

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Adds a header line of controls according to the HeaderTemplate class. It returns an array containing header index and array of created controls in  format:<br>
<tt>[<headerIndex>, [<control0>, <control1>...<control n>]]</tt>.
<br>
Note that rows and headers are indexed separately.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''ctAddHeader''' [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_array = [[ctAddHeader]] _control;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctAddRow]], [[ctClear]], [[ctCurSel]], [[ctSetCurSel]], [[ctRowControls]], [[ctHeaderControls]], [[ctRowCount]], [[ctHeaderCount]], [[ctSetValue]], [[ctValue]], [[ctSetData]], [[ctData]], [[ctFindRowHeader]], [[ctFindHeaderRows]], [[ctRemoveRows]], [[ctRemoveHeaders]], [[ctSetRowTemplate]], [[ctSetHeaderTemplate]]
</value></part></template></root>
